scripts.codegen:all: for dir in configs/*/; do for config in $dir*.ts; do echo "Generating $config"; npx graphql-codegen --config $config; done; done
scripts.codegen:plugin: for config in configs/$npm_config_plugin/*.ts; do npx graphql-codegen --config $config; done
scripts.generate:go: for dir in configs/*/; do for config in $dir*.ts; do ../../graphql-go-gen generate -c $config; done; done
scripts.generate:go:plugin: for config in configs/$npm_config_plugin/*.ts; do ../../graphql-go-gen generate -c $config; done
